headline.main: JAPAN FORECASTS NEW PACIFIC MOVE; Enemy Propagandist Asserts Strategic Bases Pave the Way for Fresh Attack CALLS AUSTRALIA NERVOUS Nazi 'Expert' Says Japanese and U.S. Are Preparing Aleutian Offensive

lead_paragraph: The Tokyo radio quoted Major Gen. Nakao Yahagi, chief of the army press section of Imperial Headquarters, as announcing in a Nagoya speech yesterday that Japan had completed establishment of strategic bases in the Southwest Pacific, "thus paving the way for contemplated new operations."
abstract: Ger Transocean news agency predicts US offensive
